metadata.synopsis: Minsc and Jaheira enter Cazador's Palace

3.speaker: Minsc
3.text: If Minsc had any hairs on his head, this place would set them all a-standing. And look how Boo's bunches his hackles!
3.context: NodeContext: A little hushed, picking our way through a vampire's mansion.

0.speaker: Jaheira
0.text: We three have come through darker places than this together, Minsc.
0.context: NodeContext: A little hushed, serious,  picking our way through a vampire's mansion. Trying to be comforting.

2.speaker: Jaheira
2.context: NodeContext: A little hushed, picking our way through a vampire's mansion. Can't help but correct him.

1.speaker: Minsc
1.text: Does Jaheira not set your heart at ease, Boo? It is comforting, to know that one so wise can be so wrong.
1.context: NodeContext: A little hushed, picking our way through a vampire's mansion. Warm - he has genuinely taken comfort from this.
